Compute the 3d components velocity field at a list of specified points in space from a distribution of line vorticity INPUT ----- paths : List of [N, 3] arrays coordinates of the points along the vorticity line. Each element of the list correspond to the coordinates of one closed loop X : List of 3 np array Coordinates of the point to compute the velocity field OUTPUT -----.
